Package Data

Class DoctorRepository

Object
BaseRepository
DoctorRepository
public class DoctorRepository extends BaseRepository
Repository class for doctor-specific operations. Extends BaseRepository to provide shared functionality while adding methods tailored to doctors.

    • getAppointmentById

      public Appointment getAppointmentById(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves an appointment by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the unique identifier of the appointment to retrieve.
      Returns:
      the Appointment object corresponding to the given ID, or null if not found.

    • getInventory

      public Inventory getInventory()
      Retrieves the inventory for doctor-specific access.
      Returns:
      the Inventory object representing the current inventory data.

    • generateNewPrescriptionId

      public String generateNewPrescriptionId()
      Generates a new unique ID for a Prescription. Ensures the generated ID does not conflict with any existing IDs of Prescriptions
      Returns:
      a unique Prescription ID in the format `Abcd-Wxyz-1234-5678`.
